Class Bullet

java.lang.Object
RobotProjectGUI.ArenaItem
RobotProjectGUI.Robot
RobotProjectGUI.Bullet
public class Bullet extends Robot
Author:
dijan Class used to represent a bullet shot by the ControllableRobot object.

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition(MyCanvas mc, boolean isCollision)
      Logic for handling how the bullet moves. Will keep moving the same direction until it's destroyed.
      Overrides:
      updatePosition in class Robot
      Parameters:
      mc - Needed for when checking if the new position is within the arena's bounds.
      isCollision - Needed for checking if it is colliding with another item.

    • getIsDestroyed

      public boolean getIsDestroyed()
      Getter to see if bullet is destroyed due to hitting a wall.
      Returns:
      If the bullet has been destroyed.

      Provides essential bullet information in string form.
      Overrides:
